tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vr_art_platform (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    model_file BLOB,
    texture_name VARCHAR(255),
    texture_file BLOB,
    user_interaction VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE 3d_models (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(50),
  model_file_url VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE textures (
  texture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  texture_name VARCHAR(50),
  texture_file_url VARCHAR(255),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_data TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
    interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    model_id UUID NOT NULL,
    interaction_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
